text: In the American Civil War, a Skirmish at Abingdon, Virginia between Union Army and Confederate States Army forces occurred on December 15, 1864 during Stoneman's 1864 Raid. == References == == External links == * Abingdon Abingdon Category:Conflicts in 1864 Category:1864 in Virginia Category:December 1864 events Category:Washington County, Virginia
title: Skirmish at Abingdon
